description:
Spacious Apartment available in Upper East Side right on 86th Street, between 2nd and 3rd avenue.

Bedroom 1: Larger, Queen bed, dresser, large mirror, and 2 beautiful windows. LOTS and LOTS of sunlight! Also a fire escape that you can walk out onto! 
Bedroom 2: smaller, queen size bed with nice dresser, mirror, window, and AC

You’ll love my place because of the convenience. 4 minute walk from 4-5-6 trains and 10 min walk to central park
name: 2 Bedroom in Convenient Upper East Side Apartment
review: Abby was a wonderful host and her place was very spacious and clean. It is in the perfect location in Manhattan!
